verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against Gog <S%H1463><s%>, the land <S%H776><s%> of Magog <S%H4031><s%>, the chief <S%H7218><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Meshech <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal <S%H8422><s%>, and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against him,

And say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog <S%H1463><s%>, the chief <S%H7218><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Meshech <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal <S%H8422><s%>:

And I will turn thee back <S%H7725><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> hooks <S%H2397><s%> into thy jaws <S%H3895><s%>, and I will bring thee forth <S%H3318><s%>, and all thine army <S%H2428><s%>, horses <S%H5483><s%> and horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, all of them clothed <S%H3847><s%> with all sorts <S%H4358><s%> of armour, even a great <S%H7227><s%> company <S%H6951><s%> with bucklers <S%H6793><s%> and shields <S%H4043><s%>, all of them handling <S%H8610><s%> swords <S%H2719><s%>:
Persia <S%H6539><s%>, Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>, and Libya <S%H6316><s%> with them; all of them with shield <S%H4043><s%> and helmet <S%H3553><s%>:

Gomer <S%H1586><s%>, and all his bands <S%H102><s%>; the house <S%H1004><s%> of Togarmah <S%H8425><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> quarters <S%H3411><s%>, and all his bands <S%H102><s%>: and many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> with thee.
Be thou prepared <S%H3559><s%>, and prepare <S%H3559><s%> for thyself, thou, and all thy company <S%H6951><s%> that are assembled <S%H6950><s%> unto thee, and be thou a guard <S%H4929><s%> unto them.

¶ After many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt be visited <S%H6485><s%>: in the latter <S%H319><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> that is brought back <S%H7725><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and is gathered <S%H6908><s%> out of many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, against the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which have been always <S%H8548><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%>: but it is brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the nations <S%H5971><s%>, and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> safely <S%H983><s%> all of them.

Thou shalt ascend <S%H5927><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> like a storm <S%H7722><s%>, thou shalt be like a cloud <S%H6051><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, thou, and all thy bands <S%H102><s%>, and many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> with thee.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; It shall also come to pass, that at the same time <S%H3117><s%> shall things <S%H1697><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> into thy mind <S%H3824><s%>, and thou shalt think <S%H2803><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> thought <S%H4284><s%>:

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%>, I will go up <S%H5927><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of unwalled villages <S%H6519><s%>; I will go <S%H935><s%> to them that are at rest <S%H8252><s%>, that dwell <S%H3427><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>, all of them dwelling <S%H3427><s%> without walls <S%H2346><s%>, and having neither bars <S%H1280><s%> nor gates <S%H1817><s%>,

To take <S%H7997><s%> a spoil <S%H7998><s%>, and to take <S%H962><s%> a prey <S%H957><s%>; to turn <S%H7725><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the desolate places <S%H2723><s%> that are now inhabited <S%H3427><s%>, and upon the people <S%H5971><s%> that are gathered <S%H622><s%> out of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, which have gotten <S%H6213><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%> and goods <S%H7075><s%>, that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H2872><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

Sheba <S%H7614><s%>, and Dedan <S%H1719><s%>, and the merchants <S%H5503><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%>, with all the young lions <S%H3715><s%> thereof, shall say <S%H559><s%> unto thee, Art thou come <S%H935><s%> to take <S%H7997><s%> a spoil <S%H7998><s%>? hast thou gathered <S%H6950><s%> thy company <S%H6951><s%> to take <S%H962><s%> a prey <S%H957><s%>? to carry away <S%H5375><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, to take away <S%H3947><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%> and goods <S%H7075><s%>, to take <S%H7997><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%>?

¶ Therefore, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto Gog <S%H1463><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; In that day <S%H3117><s%> when my people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>, shalt thou not know <S%H3045><s%> it?

And thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> from thy place <S%H4725><s%> out of the north <S%H6828><s%> parts <S%H3411><s%>, thou, and many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> with thee, all of them riding <S%H7392><s%> upon horses <S%H5483><s%>, a great <S%H1419><s%> company <S%H6951><s%>, and a mighty <S%H7227><s%> army <S%H2428><s%>:

And thou shalt come up <S%H5927><s%> against my people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, as a cloud <S%H6051><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>; it shall be in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, and I will bring <S%H935><s%> thee against my land <S%H776><s%>, that the heathen <S%H1471><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> me, when I shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in thee, O Gog <S%H1463><s%>, before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Art thou he of whom I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in old <S%H6931><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in those days <S%H3117><s%> many years <S%H8141><s%> that I would bring <S%H935><s%> thee against them?

And it shall come to pass at the same time <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H3117><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, that my fury <S%H2534><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> in my face <S%H639><s%>.

For in my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> and in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%> have I spoken <S%H1696><s%>, Surely in that day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a great <S%H1419><s%> shaking <S%H7494><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

So that the fishes <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and all creeping things <S%H7431><s%> that creep <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H127><s%>, and all the men <S%H120><s%> that are upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>, shall shake <S%H7493><s%> at my presence <S%H6440><s%>, and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall be thrown down <S%H2040><s%>, and the steep places <S%H4095><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%>, and every wall <S%H2346><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And I will call <S%H7121><s%> for a sword <S%H2719><s%> against him throughout all my mountains <S%H2022><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>: every man's <S%H376><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> shall be against his brother <S%H251><s%>.

And I will plead <S%H8199><s%> against him with pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and with blood <S%H1818><s%>; and I will rain <S%H4305><s%> upon him, and upon his bands <S%H102><s%>, and upon the many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> that are with him, an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%>, and great hailstones <S%H417><s%> <S%H68><s%>, fire <S%H784><s%>, and brimstone <S%H1614><s%>.

Thus will I magnify <S%H1431><s%> myself, and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> myself; and I will be known <S%H3045><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
